page.title: 14Adults Spare Time - Sealand
page.content: Here are some of the things adults do in their spare time. Well, the most known things that adults do is to sit down and read the paper, make a cup of tea or coffee, or watch television. Sometimes they listen to the radio or listen to their records.They often go to the library to get some books to read, or they sometimes read a magazine. Sometimes they smoke cigarettes or a pipe. In the week if they haven't got anything else to do they go to the shop to get something to eat or they sometimes go to the chip shop to get some chips. Sometimes they go to visit their friends or go somewhere for a drive in their car. Sometimes, if the weather is nice they sit or lie in the garden and sunbathe. Sometimes your dad has to go and do some work in the garden like mowing the lawn,digging up roots.
